alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 25 at 10:50AM PST until February 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 14 inches possible on high elevations. 1 to 5 inches at lower elevations. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph on exposed ridges Monday. * WHERE...Southeastern Mendocino Interior and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County
